description: Background study: Finding resources on extensions and encryption methods; searched through chrome and firefox extensions and read LastPass whitepaper on security and functionaliy.
Group meeting. Discussed goals for challenge 7 and further defined scope of project.
First Half of chrome extension tutorial. Modified to use styling and browser action more relevant to our application (required further research).
Last part of chrome extension tutorial. Discovered issue with inline code with extensions; researched event listeners, button prints input from text boxes
Reading through examples of other extensions. Setting up permissions and background script for reading DOM content. Created container class to hold usernames and passwords.
